Summary: star like, but closer to earth, moved in the sky took a 45 degree left turn and disappeared, another followed on the same path
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting out on my back porch in boulder in the evening and looking at the stars, saw a star like light moving rapidly moving from upper sky to lower, suddenly it took a 45 degree left turn went a little way and disappeared. Immediately another exactly the same did the same on the same path. It was too far and bright to be a star, and too accurate and with a 45 degree turn, to be human.
trends: There have been 30 other sightings in Boulder
There were no other sightings in Boulder on or around July 15th 1973
